title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge (1995)
description: A timeless love story that follows Raj and Simran, two young Indians living in London, who fall in love during a European vacation. But when Simran is taken back to India for an arranged marriage, Raj must win over her family to marry the girl he loves. A landmark in Indian cinema, the film redefined romance for a generation and remains one of the longest-running films in Indian theatre history.
